response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We understand its significance to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you.

We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price tailored to reflect its importance to both parties. Our proposed price for this exceptional item is $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the perceived value to you, aiming to maximize the benefits for all involved.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you find it favorable, we would be more than happy to proceed with the transaction. If you require additional information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
